channel.title: VMWare VSphere on This Is My Demo
channel.description: Recent content in VMWare VSphere on This Is My Demo

item.title: Azure Arc and VMWare Oh Yeah
item.description: I drink the Microsoft Kool-aid and have for many years. What you may not know is years ago, many years ago, I use to drink the Vmware Kool-aid and would attend VMUGs and was certified for VMware. This was about the version 4 days when vSphere was fairly new and there wasn’t much more to Vmware than vCenter and ESXi servers. I jumped ship to the dark side, mainly because I started working with SMS 2003 and Configuration manager 2007 after a little bit of time working with Altiris Deployment Server and Notification Server.
